# DispatchQueue.AutoreleaseFrequency.never

**Case**

The queue does not set up an autorelease pool around executed blocks.

## Declaration

```swift
case never
```

## Discussion

This option is the default behavior for the system-defined global queues.

## Autorelease Frequencies

- **DispatchQueue.AutoreleaseFrequency.inherit**: The queue inherits its autorelease frequency from its target queue.
- **DispatchQueue.AutoreleaseFrequency.workItem**: The queue configures an autorelease pool before the execution of a block, and releases the objects in that pool after the block finishes executing.
